attributes.review: By far the worst app I’ve ever seen in my life causing my phone to glitch multiple times leaving my phone permanently damaged, had to purchase a new one. Such a drag, very ghetto would not recommend 😌
attributes.title: ghetto

attributes.review: Lots of offense to Trump supporters. You really HONESTLY believe that this man is a great president and person but you claim you aren’t racist, homophobic, transphobic, and sexist. That’s really all I have to say. I could say more but y’all wouldn’t be able to understand logic.
attributes.title: I’m disgusted

attributes.review: I can’t believe I even wasted the space on my phone to download this. It doesn’t match with the aesthetic on my home screen. Idk why they had to pick such an ugly aesthetic for this app. I’m thoroughly disappointed. Trash. TRASH!
